
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/laoaiaishijie/p/19042085" title="发布于 2025-08-16 14:13">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">AI去、穿、换装软件下载，无内容限制，偷偷收藏</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p><span style="font-family: Calibri">Z</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">ephyr</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">是一款多模态图像编辑工具，具备强大的上下文理解能力，支持通过文本指令对现有图像进行智能修改，该工具拥有</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">120</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">亿参数，能够在消费级硬件上运行，并提供媲美专有工具的图像编辑质量</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: Calibri">Z</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">ephyr</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">本质上是利用了</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">AI</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">模型强大的文本到图像的联合理解机制，上传一张人物图和一张服装图，就可以完美的拼合在一起，非常适合电商使用，和普通修图软件不同的是，</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">Z</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">ephyr</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">本身没有任何内容限制，想怎么改就怎么改，就是要多准备点营养快线</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">[</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">开玩笑的</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">~]</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: Calibri"><img alt="1" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3334113/202508/3334113-20250816140952651-364348487.jpg" class="lazyload"></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong><span style="font-family: Calibri">Z</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: Calibri">ephyr</span></strong><strong>最新中文版：</strong></p>
<p><strong>百度网盘：</strong><a href="https://pan.baidu.com/s/1amA0AfBuKx7rrcbh3bNWRA?pwd=vbjg" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="text-decoration: underline">https://pan.baidu.com/s/1amA0AfBuKx7rrcbh3bNWRA?pwd=vbjg</span></a></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong>核心特点</strong></p>
<p><strong>·</strong>&nbsp;<span style="font-family: 宋体">角色一致性：在多个场景和环境中保留图像的独特元素，例如图片中的参考角色或物体</span></p>
<p><strong>· </strong>风格参考：根据文本提示，在保留参考图像独特风格的同时生成新颖场景</p>
<p><strong>·</strong>&nbsp;<span style="font-family: 宋体">局部编辑：对图像中的特定部位进行有针对性的修改，而不影响其他部分</span></p>
<p><strong>· </strong><span style="font-family: 宋体">交互速度：以最小的延迟对图像生成和编辑进行迭代，比同规格扩散系模型普遍快约</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">10</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">倍</span></p>
<p><strong>使用方法</strong></p>
<p><span style="font-family: Calibri">1.</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">上传人物图片</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: Calibri">2.</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">输入文本提示词</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: Calibri">3.</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">上传服装图片</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: Calibri">4.</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">输入上传服装的提示词，如：</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">Put the girl on the same dress as this one</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">（给这个女孩穿上和这件一模一样的连衣裙）</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: Calibri">5.</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">点击</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">run</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">，开始运行</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 宋体">保留默认提示词就可以开启无限制内容，也可以在后面添加自己想要输入的提示词，如：</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">Put on a bikini</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">（穿上泳衣）</span></p>
<p><img alt="2" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3334113/202508/3334113-20250816140959151-1993155729.jpg" class="lazyload"></p>
<p>可以在软件后台查看当前的执行进度，程序处理完毕会输出信息<em><span style="font-family: Calibri">Requested to load AutoencodingEngine</span></em><span style="font-family: 宋体">，生成的图片默认保存在项目路径的</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">output</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">文件夹下，也可以鼠标右键“图像界面”打开或者下载图片</span></p>
<p><img alt="3" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3334113/202508/3334113-20250816141003741-1441148395.jpg" class="lazyload"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong>注意事项</strong></p>
<p>①使用过程中若不慎关闭软件后台，请重新打开，并刷新网页</p>
<p><span style="font-family: 宋体">②软件支持</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">cpu</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">模式，但是</span>比较<span style="font-family: 宋体">慢，推荐使用</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">GTX1070</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">以上显卡运行此项目</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 宋体">③本项目仅供</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">AI</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">技术交流学习，请在法律允许的范围内使用</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
</div>
<div class="clear"></div>
